name: Internal Energy
description: Training methods to develop and control the internal energy (Qi) within Tai Chi practice.

cards.title: Qigong Breathing
cards.description: A foundational breathing technique for cultivating internal energy.
bulletpoints: Inhale deeply through the nose, expanding the diaphragm
Exhale slowly and visualize energy flowing through the body
Maintain a calm and steady rhythm
cards.summaryText: Cycle deep qigong breaths with calm visualization to smooth qi through the body.

cards.title: Dan Tian Energy Focus
cards.description: A meditative practice for concentrating energy in the lower abdomen.
bulletpoints: Place hands over the lower abdomen and focus on warmth
Use circular hand motions to guide internal energy
Coordinate slow movements with deep breathing
cards.summaryText: Center awareness in the dan tian, circling the hands and breath to gather warmth.
